name: ancient-meteor-graph
description: Graph class adapted for Meteor Minimongo database.
author: Ivan S Glazunov <ivansglazunov@gmail.com>

scripts.jsdoc: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ./doc && git checkout gh-pages && cd ../ && npm i && rm -rf ./doc/*/ && find ./doc ! -name '.git' -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && jsdoc ./graph.js ./README.md -r -d ./doc -t ./node_modules/minami
